review: The Fire Stick was plugged into an HDMI port on our TV, but seldom seems able to pick up signals.  We've generally been unable to communicate with it;neither the controller furnished with it nor the "advanced controller" furnished with our Amazon Fire Unit.  (Note the "advanced contoller does a better job, communicating ~20% of the time.I upgraded our home Wi-Fi system with a new repeater and now use the TV contoller to choose HDMI input and select from Amazon or Netflix channels (we are a Netflix streaming subscriber).Basically, I would call this device a "fail"; note however that we live in an L-shaped stucco home where in-wall construction screening for the stucco certainly can degrade transmission signals from across the Bay in San Diego.
